author: martin
msg: ftp proxy: various cosmetic and functional improvements
- Allow for /%2f hack (to access the root directory / )
- properly escape generated links in dir listing
- do directory listings in ASCII, to avoid problems with EBCDIC servers
- close data & control channels to server properly
- rename "BUFF f" to "BUFF data" or "BUFF ctrl", depending on its FTP use

author: martin
msg: * Rename "BUFF f" to "BUFF data" or "BUFF ctrl", depending on ftp use
* Make output look more like xhtml (cosmetics only)
* Properly escape file names from ftp directory listing (as HTML or URI)
* Treat ftp rc 421 (closing connection) like -1 (connection was closed)

author: brianp
msg: optimized away one more filter name lookup during request processing

author: brianp
msg: Replaced some more ap_add_output_filter() calls with

author: stoddard
msg: Remove the create_connection hook and put the client_socket back into the
conn_rec. The create_connection_hook has a design flaw that prevents it
from making decisions based on vhost information.
